name: Savings USD0
description: The Usual protocol is a decentralized finance framework centered around yield bearing assets such as RWA or blue chip protocol tokens. It embodies the principle of redistributing value generated by users through a revenue-based token, USUAL. This approach enables users to access yields while simultaneously gaining exposure to the protocolâ€™s growth and long-term success. Its innovative distribution model sets the stage for new DeFi possibilities, accelerating ecosystem expansion and sustainable decentralization.
